EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Learn 3 Tips for Superconnecting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
On February 21 at 1 p.m. ET, we will hold a webinar entitled "Three Expert Tips for Superconnecting: How to Build the Relationships That Build Business <http://info.mbopartners.com/21Feb13WebSuperConnecting_RegistrationPage.html>."
In this expert webinar, Judy Robinett, a business thought leader and funding guru dubbed as a "superconnector," will draw from her upcoming book on the topic of how to build a powerful business network. Judyâ€™s techniques launched her successful independent career after years as a corporate CEO and financier. Her proven method stands apart from traditional networking, teaching you how to make connections with the right people, in the right groups, in the right ways.
Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/21Feb13WebSuperConnecting_RegistrationPage.html> to find the contacts that will help your business succeed. ___________________________________ MBO Partners t: 1-800-220-0469 e: info@mbopartners.com
